name: Moonlight Quest
description:
Five friends are chilling in front of a campfire and make bets on who can go to the Moon in the allotted time. Use one of these five characters to try to reach the Moon.

All of them have specials caracteristics, use the one that suits you best.

Realised by french students : Bazinet Raphael, Guillou Thomas, Laspoumaderes Maxim, Sajous Théo, Salefranque Hugo.
